explanation.text:

1 = 2 x 3.142\(\sqrt\frac{L}{10}\)

L= 0.25m

= 1.08%

\(\approx\) = 1.1%

-The image formed by a concave mirror can be real or virtual, enlarged or diminished, and erect or inverted, depending upon the distance of the object from the mirror

explanation.text:
Explanation
Diagram above shows a Parallel circuit
If one of the parallel path is broken, current will continue to flow in other parts.
 Voltage is the same across each component of the parallel circuit.
The brightness of a light bulb is given by its power. P = I\(^2\)R,
and so brightness depends on current and resistance.
Hence; the brightness of Y will not be affected except for a variation in resistance property.
